TopicTitle: KIS / how to attach parts with drill or wrench in space?

Articles.Content: How do I attach items in a storage container to a rocket while in space? When I remove items from storage they float away( I cant grab them). Sometimes the part glows green to show you can place, but I cant get them to attach. I have tried with drill or wrench equipped, but nothing happens.

You should have perhaps asked in the [KIS Add-on Releases Thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/113111-1-0-2-Kerbal-Inventory-System-%28KIS%29-1-1-4) and not started a new thread here.

But a quick answer (also found on that page and in the PDF that comes with KIS), pressing 'x' will use the equipped tool and cause your engineer to attach the part.

You shouldn't have post a completely new thread in the Add-On release forum to ask a single question about a mod. Please go to the actual mod thread and ask there: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/113111-1-0-2-Kerbal-Inventory-System-%28KIS%29-1-1-4](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/113111-1-0-2-Kerbal-Inventory-System-%28KIS%29-1-1-4)

This forum is for mod releases; tech support for mods are in the respective mods' threads.

EDIT: Ninja'd...

Moved to General Add-on Affairs, where questions about mods can be asked and answered. A reminder: if you see a thread you think is in the wrong location, hit the report button rather than posting about it in the thread.

Deadpan110 is right that you not only need an equipped tool, but also left-click while holding the X key. If you have other questions, you can post them here in General Add-on Affairs, or in the KIS thread. There's also a manual in the game as a part. ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
